entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:01 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Bancroft

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
